20101204010742.000|20101204010744.000|CCO|>> IN PASSING THESE CUTS AND

20101204010746.000|20101204010748.000|CCO|RONALD REAGAN'S TAX CUTS HAVE

20101204010750.000|20101204010752.000|CCO|ARE THEY BEING INVOKED

20101204010753.111|20101204010754.222|CCO|OF THOSE CUTS BEING INVOKED

20101204010755.333|20101204010756.444|CCO|>> NO.
20101204010756.444|20101204010757.556|CCO|I THINK TOTALLY INCORRECTLY.
20101204010757.556|20101204010758.667|CCO|THAT WAS 1981.
20101204010758.667|20101204010759.778|CCO|WE HAD A CLEAN NATIONAL BALANCE 
20101204010759.778|20101204010800.889|CCO|SHEET.
20101204010800.889|20101204010802.000|CCO|I REMEMBER WELL GOING IN THE 
20101204010802.000|20101204010803.667|CCO|FIRST MONTH, WE HAD A RAISE THE 
20101204010803.667|20101204010805.333|CCO|DEBT CEILING, $1 TRILLION.
